import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EditTask=()=>{const location=useLocation();const navigate=useNavigate();const{task}=location.state;const[formData,setFormData]=useState(task);const handleInputChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});};const handleFormSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.put("http://localhost:3000/api/tasks/".concat(formData._id),formData);navigate("/tasks");}catch(err){console.log('Error in udpating the task',err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Update Task"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleFormSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Task Title:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"title",value:formData.title,onChange:handleInputChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Update Task"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:()=>navigate("/tasks"),children:"Cancel"})]})]});};export default EditTask;
